event.title: Fellowship meeting at FSCONS, Gothenburg, Sweden
event.body:
During the Free Society Conference and Nordic Summit, we will have a Fellowship meeting. Help us with your ideas, get some stuff done and give us feedback.
* 10:00 – 10:15: Greeting
* 10:15 – 11:15: Preparing activities for I love Free Software
* 11:30 – 12:30: Preparing activities for Document Freedom Day
* 12:45 – 14:00: Lunch break
* 14:00 – 17:00: PDFreaders sprint: Fixing existing bugs, contact new organisations.
* 17:15 – 18:45: “How FSFE can suck less!” Feedback session about our work, with questions and answers.
